education_text.0: Page attended Okemos      redirect    Montessori School (now called Montessori Radmoor) in      Okemos, Michigan Okemos, Michigan, from ages 2 to 7 (1975 to 1979)Page received a      Bachelor of Science Bachelor of Science with a major in      Computer engineering computer engineering with honors from the      University of Michigan University of Michigan in 1995 and a      Master of Science Master of Science in      Computer science computer science from      Stanford University Stanford University in 1998While at the University of Michigan, Page created an      redirect    Inkjet printer inkjet printer made of      Lego bricks (literally a      redirect    Line plotter line plotter), after he thought it possible to print large posters cheaply with the use of inkjet cartridgesAfter enrolling in a      Computer science computer science PhD program at      Stanford University Stanford University, Page was in search of a      redirect    dissertation theme and considered exploring the mathematical properties of the      World Wide Web World Wide Web, understanding its link structure as a huge    The pair's mission was 'to organize the world's information and make it universally accessible and usefulWith Facebook's influence rapidly expanding during the start of Page's second tenure, he finally responded to the intensive competition with Google's own social network,   Page also ventured into hardware and Google unveiled the      Chromebook in May 2012In a November 2014 interview, Page stated that he prioritized the maintenance of his  deep knowledge  of Google's products and breadth of projects, as it had been a key motivating factor for team membersPage helped to set up      redirect    Singularity University Singularity University, a      transhumanist tank
